name: Garry The Wizard
description:
Epic adveture Battle royale adventure starring Gary the Wizard. Help hte wise Greegg save the world from the evil lord evil fight bad guys and find epic loot that help kill thing! 

(real talk, if you beat this, you need a life. Go outside, enjoy a nice walk through nature. This game does have flashing colours and incredibly loud audio, so be warned.)

Download instructions;

1. download zip file

2. unzip file

3. play

4. seek advice about the choices you have made about playing this game
